metadata.synopsis: Rowan Elkfriend, male forest gnome character outside Elfsong Tavern, drinking and wandering and talking to other characters.

0.speaker: Rowan Elkfriend
0.text: On days like this I miss the forest. I used to scamper amongst my woodland friends, if you can believe it. Here? Not a squirrel in sight.

1.speaker: Rowan Elkfriend
1.text: Sorry, stranger, for getting maudlin about the forest before. I'm not at my best.
